content: inspired by wool camping blankets and designed for cozy nights under the stars the woodcutters hat is a timeless staple to reach for again and again meant to be worn with a rolled or folded brim this hat has extra warmth and squish for those chilly winter days this hat begins with a provisional cast on that allows for a completely reversible finished product the two halves of the hat follow different stripe patterns allowing the wearer to change things up to suit their style and mood
